title: Can this post reach 666 upvotes for the glory of Satan?

replies.body:
My heresy sense is never wrong.

https://img.ifcdn.com/images/d1979804df81bfbd2316b4aba366d96f7c97899282e6e5b87a5be465871bef5b_1.jpg
Satin is a wonderful fabric, don't you think?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 
That's some good stuff, right there.

LOL, that mystery gift ... I wonder if typing "please be teemo" {{champion:86}}-tees it's Teemo.

Sorry for the pun, but I had to.
Now this is how you farm upvotes right.
... I should point out that I've NEVER seen a meme lord get downvotes.

Currently he's at 39 downvotes, 139 upvotes on my screen, so yes it does generate downvotes.

EDIT: 139 DOWNVOTES BOIS

Don't check out my work on GD then. I would hate to burst your bubble. 
http://66.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_matpbvObfc1qkcx1fo1_500.gif

If you download the Forum Enhencer Kit (F.E.K.), its possible to see the numbers of downvotes af any posted threads.

Details here : http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/3V6I7JvK
The Inspect element does wonders, doesn't it?
Why is this trending on the first page
True, but I won't do it again anytime soon.
No priest will save you from the Almighty Teemo!
Fine... You leave me no choice... Are you ready?
Odd, I'm not blinded at all, though it did take a while to see anything else :)
The malware already downloaded when you clicked the link

Because i have no soul!

[Trial by... Confusion](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=jfZOvQnsBq0)

I have friends who enjoy tormenting me

[Trial by Bull Shit... Ps, not sorry](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=4CVTuOyZDI0)
Shameless upvote farming but still upvoted
Why not 666 downvotes? It's Teemo for crying out loud.
